FAQ & Troubleshooting

Why isn't my calculator showing results?

  • Refresh the page (Ctrl+Shift+R or Cmd+Shift+R)
  • Clear browser cookies and cache
  • Try a different browser
  • Ensure JavaScript is enabled in your browser
  • Check your internet connection

Is my data safe when using calculators?

Yes! All calculations happen in your browser. Your input data is never sent to our servers. We use HTTPS encryption for all data transmission. See our Privacy Policy for complete details.

Can I use these calculators for professional purposes?

Our calculators are for informational and educational purposes. For professional use (financial planning, medical advice, legal matters), always consult with qualified professionals. See our Terms of Service for details.

How do you calculate BMI/EMI/GPA?

Each calculator page includes the specific formula used. Click on any calculator to see the detailed explanation and formula.

Can I embed your calculators on my website?

Contact us at calculatorsolution@gmail.com to discuss embedding options and licensing.

Do you have a mobile app?

Currently, CalculatorSolution is a web-based platform that works perfectly on mobile browsers. Native iOS and Android apps are coming soon!

Can you add a new calculator?

We'd love to hear your suggestions! Submit calculator requests at calculatorsolution@gmail.com or use our feedback form above.

How often do you update calculators?

We regularly review and update our calculators to ensure accuracy. Interest rates, tax rates, and other variables are updated as needed based on current regulations.

Do you offer API access?

API access and white-label solutions are available for businesses. Contact calculatorsolution@gmail.com for details.

Report a Bug or Issue

If you discovered a bug, error, or technical issue, please report it to: calculatorsolution@gmail.com

Please include:

  • Which calculator had the issue
  • What browser you were using
  • What operating system (Windows, Mac, iOS, Android)
  • Steps to reproduce the issue
  • Screenshots if applicable

If you have concerns about how we handle your personal data, or wish to exercise your privacy rights (like GDPR or CCPA requests), please contact: calculatorsolution@gmail.com

For complete information, see our Privacy Policy.
